description:
Our client's company, a family-owned independent agency specializes in Group Benefits, and Commercial and Personal lines of insurance. They offer a professional and somewhat conservative environment focused on Commercial Property, General Liabilities, Commercial Auto, Workers Comp, Flood, Earthquake, Employment Practices, Management Liabilities, and more.

With a team of 20 dedicated employees, they pride themselves on their company culture, office environment, and employee benefits plan. They are seeking a Commercial Account Manager (CSR) to join their team and manage a small to mid-market book of business.

Responsibilities

  • Manage the entire renewal process for each account from start to finish
  • Negotiate with carriers and re-market rates
  • Process certificates and endorsements
  • Send quotes to clients and bind policies
  • Facilitate the renewal process, while brokers typically present renewals to clients


Qualifications

  • Minimum 3 years of Commercial Insurance experience with an independent agency
  • Residency within Oregon or Arizona
  • Stable work history, no job hoppers


This fully remote role is an excellent opportunity for an experienced account manager with an independent broker background. If you are a qualified candidate looking to thrive in a supportive and professional environment, we encourage you to apply and become a valued member of our client's team.
